alert.note: Alert for Broadwater; Central and Southern Lewis and Clark; Jefferson; Meagher (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 12:04AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Lewis and Clark, Broadwater, western Meagher, northeastern Jefferson and southwestern Cascade Counties through 100 AM MDT... At 1201 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking shower and thunderstorm activity over southern Lewis and Clark County, northern Jefferson County, northern Broadwater County, and southwestern Cascade County. This activity is moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Observed. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Helena, Townsend, East Helena, Montana City, Wolf Creek, Fort Logan On The Smith River, York, Rimini, Alhambra, Corbin, Spring Meadow Lake State Park, Austin, Fort Logan, Marysville, Tower Rock State Park, Winston, Craig, Silos, Clancy and Canyon Creek. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 175 and 248. Highway 12 between mile markers 1 and 31, and between mile markers 29 and 84. Highway 287 between mile markers 1 and 4 . MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
